section.title: Introduction
section.para: This guide contains information of interest to developers working with XIO. It provides reference information for application developers, including APIs, architecture, procedures for using the APIs and code samples.

section.title: Public interface
section.para: The semantics and syntax of the APIs and WSDL for the component, along with descriptions of domain-specific structured interface data, can be found in the public interface guide.
